Add extra personality with unique and chic decor pieces. And voilà, you’ll have a living room worthy of a design magazine. Created by Pierisim.

description: Give your Sims a professional edge with chic and stylish outfits from The Sims 4 Business Chic Kit*. From tailored suits to elegant dresses, Sims will feel confident and fashionable. Complete the look with sleek shoes and fancy accessories for an extra touch of class. The Business Chic Kit ensures Sims always look up to the task. Created by Madlen.

name: Drinking in the hot spring!
description: In this humor-filled human drama, you take on the role of the leader of a hot spring drinking club, spending enjoyable moments with a diverse group of members from different ages and backgrounds. As you bond with them, you’ll support them through their worries and troubles, sometimes with a little help from alcohol, and help to heal their hearts.

name: Rolling Macho: Tumbling to Earth
description: Rolling Macho: Tumbling to Earth is a rolling action game where you roll and squat your way back to Earth after being stranded in space.

name: Kingdom Rush 5: Alliance - Colossal Dwarfare
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Thunder Fox
description:
THUNDER FOX is an action game released by TAITO in 1990.
Become a member of the "THUNDER FOX" anti-terrorism team and join the fight against the terrorists.
Complete varied missions using flying kicks, somersault attacks, and multiple unique vehicles such as gyrocopters, jet skis and more!

name: Beyond Blue: After the Storm
description: After a severe tropical storm damages an underwater research station, Mirai and her crew are asked to help repair the damage and lend aid to the creatures in the surrounding biosphere. What they uncover there is more dangerous than they could have realized and will take all their skills, and help from an unexpected ally, to make right.

name: Trail of Stars
description: Trail of Stars is a short, bittersweet fairy-tale about two vulnerable souls navigating first love, growing up, and protecting what they have—when all they have is each other.

name: Froggy Drink Bar!
description:
The Froggy Drink Bar is open! Help coco the frog keep things running!

Mix colors to create drinks and keep clients happy. Good luck!

name: Skufs vs. Quadrobers
description: This isn't what our grandfathers fought for! Rise from your soulful, old apartment and resist the Western heathens – the Quadrobers, who are trying to impose their rules! Or, join the modern Quadrobers and show the Skufs that the era of sweaty, beer-bellied men is over!

name: Articrafty
description: What will you create? Combine realism and fantasy. Combine characteristics with abilities. Create unique items. Achieve "Legendary" mastery. Breathe life.

name: Apple Orchard Escape
description: Overview: Run around an apple orchard as Val, she is the pumpkin headed mascot of a rival pumpkin patch to the apple orchard that she finds herself at. Don't make too much noise or you'll be caught!

name: 10 Seconds
description: Time loop puzzle horror, where you're stuck in a failed experiment and must escape or face being eaten for eternity.

name: Winter Hubris
description: A point-and-click horror game where you must survive in an isolated base as you wait for rescue.

name: Morsomnia:0
description: Interacting with the unidentified life form “Kuon”, we move forward with the pain. A surreal, mysterious fancy adventure.

name: Backyard Boxing
description: Backyard Boxing" is a gritty urban boxing game where you fight to rise through an illegal league while hustling in the streets. Battle fierce opponents, gamble, race, deal, and travel to new cities, gaining fans and respect. Dominate the league and become a street legend!

name: InorStreet
description: A short shooting RPG where you destroy non-aggressive enemies called "Inorganic"

name: Idol Symphony
description: Melodies, outfits and puzzles – the bright show begins!

name: Star Rush: Stack & Jump
description: Just stack boxes, jump, and collect stars! Easy, right?

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket: Space-Time Smackdown
description: Sin descripción

name: LostMagic
description: A 2D RPG with turn-based combat, dungeons and PvP in a unique world.

name: Screensaver Battle
description: A new-sensation on-screen screensaver battle game "ScreenSaver Battle" where a special move is unleashed when you hit the corner!!

name: Bubble Shooter World
description: Aim for bubbles of the same color and enjoy the satisfying pops when you take multiple down in one go!

name: Colorizing: Animals
description: Coloring by numbers game for relaxation

name: Shawley: Zoo of Wonders
description: Navigate through enchanted worlds, defeat foes with your hammer, unlock new skills and save escaped animals to reopen the zoo.

name: Subway Sprint Girl
description: Embark on the Ultimate Running Adventure!

name: Connect the Circuit 1000
description:
Connect the path for electric flow,
A simple and smart puzzle to know.

name: Libritopia: Librarian Simulator
description: Manage your own library! Organize and classify books however you like, furnish the space with shelves, help visitors find their books, and maintain silence to keep them happy!

name: Swarm Madness
description: Your fortress is under constant attack, and you must save everyone who counts on you. Keep the walls strong and keep the mutants from getting inside.

name: Thesaurus
description: Help Joan the warrior and her best friend Krista find peace and redemption in this RPG tale worth about 10-15 hours of playtime.

name: The Headliners
description: Co-op horror game where you play in teams of 1 to 4 reckless journalists, ready to explore a city overrun by deadly creatures to snap spectacular footage. Your only goal: make the headlines without becoming one.

name: Rabi-Ribi: Platinum Edition DLC Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Masquerade: Hell Academy
description:
The quiet Numata Hiroshi is being blackmailed by his classmate, Himehara Yoritake, into performing sexual acts for him. One day, Himehara orders Numata to steal the exam answers off the teacher's desk, which sets off a chain of events culminating in the two men being among the captives taken by a criminal impersonating a police officer.

Their captor demands increasingly depraved acts from his hostages, and if they're going to survive, they have no choice but to comply...

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2
description: "Cardfight!! Vanguard," has newly come to digital game! Over 3,000 cards for the Standard format! A brand-new original story shares the world of anime series unfolds! Enjoy your own cardfight experience!!

name: Accolade Sports Collection
description:
Accolade Sports Collection is a retro collection featuring some of the most iconic sports games from the early 90s. This collection includes titles like Summer Challenge, Winter Challenge, Hardball 1&2 and Hoops Shut Up and Jam!.

This collection offers a complete retro gaming experience, where players can easily select from the different titles available, with features like save states, filters options, manuals and more!

name: Super Tax City
description: A new sensation!? City-building x Roguelike game, Super Tax City. Choose and place your favorite facilities from randomly drawn options! The combinations are endless! Create a profitable city that's uniquely yours!

name: Nexus Station
description: Nexus Station is a cross-platform Social Sandbox MMO. With endless possibilities; from world creation, crafting, co-op PvE dungeons, PvP brawler, competitive gameplay and more, Nexus Station is going to have endless amounts of exciting and varied content that you can be part of creating.

name: Cube Snake
description: Slither through a retro-futuristic cyberpunk world in this 3D Cubic take of the classic 1976 & 1998 Snake games.

name: Poppy Playtime: Chapter 4 - Safe Haven
description:
Brace yourself for the darkest chapter yet in the epic Poppy Playtime saga.

You are pushed deeper into the undiscovered depths of the Playtime Co. factory, far below anything the world knew. Here, you’ll encounter terrifying new threats and discover shocking revelations. Can you outwit the unnatural new creations lurking in the shadows? Can you survive here long enough to eventually unravel the mysteries behind the experiments? Every step will test your courage, every puzzle will challenge your mind, and every corner may be your last.

Will you escape the horrors hidden within Playtime Co., or will you succumb to the terror? Survival isn’t guaranteed. Fear is.

name: The Elevator
description: You are trapped in the elevator in an urban ghost story. The goal is to complete the appropriate combination of floors and come back to real world.

name: Sniper Elite: Resistance
description: Offering unparalleled sniping mechanics, stealth and tactical third-person combat, Sniper Elite: Resistance turns the attention of the award-winning series towards a hidden war, far from the front lines, deep within the heart of occupied France.

name: Bazaar Simulator
description: Bring the traditional market experience to the modern world! Arrange vegetables and fruits on stalls and fulfill customer orders. Set prices, hire staff, and expand your market. Online orders, home delivery, and much more coming soon.

name: Tiny Kingdom
description: Forge your path from a humble farm into a majestic Kingdom, crafting your realm in a tranquil and enchanting card-based city-builder adventure

name: Au Revoir
description: Use your investigative skills in this point-and-click adventure to retrieve human minds stored in synthetic brains in 2071. Immerse yourself in a retro-futuristic world with neon-noir graphics from the 90s, and uncover a conspiracy that will challenge everything you know.

name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero
description: Join Marona and her Phantom friends on a mission to defeat the sinister Shipwreck Fleet! Recruit Phantoms, bind them to objects, combine them with Gadgets, and even merge them with Marona herself in this Play-It-Your-Way RPG.

name: Whispers of the Eyeless
description: Guide your Cult. Oversee your Sanctum. Stay in the Shadows. Serve the Dead Gods.

name: Sword Lake
description: "Sword Lake" is a national style survival Rogue, class survivor game. There are no superfluous skills here, only swords, please feel free to build your unsurpassed sword

name: A Rite from the Stars: Remaster Edition
description: When the stars descend on Kaikala they choose a young boy to leave childhood behind and become a legend. It’s time for Kirm, a mute but skilled boy, to overcome the challenges that await in the wisdom, courage & spirit paths in this touching story with several endings!

name: Angry Universe VR
description: A universe simulation with destruction, gravity physics, natural disasters and aliens all in virtual reality! You play as a god-like creature with the task to fend of invading aliens, to attack alien headquarters and to project your allies from natural disasters.

name: SuperTaxCity
description: In a country where taxes are repeatedly raised, you become the owner of a certain city and develop it. Build facilities, expand the city, and create a city that will not be defeated by tax increases!

name: PixelCaves
description: A Game where you need to run as fast as you can.

name: Manzaka
description: Manzaka is a fun action rpg focus on melee combat and interesting mechanics! Customize your character with different passive skill tree options and blast enemies through levels...

name: Hentai Girls: Mandarin Love
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Berserk High
description: Berserk High is an action RPG in which you defeat numerous enemies with a combination of various skills. The footsteps of the enigmatic wanderer Bella lead to the Furnace of Chaos, where 12 great heroes are confined. She is supposed to endure the most severe trials across the entire universe.

name: Techno Banter
description: Surrounded by bright neons, filthy streets and even filthier techno beats, it is you who guard the entrance to the rave. Sharpen your wits and deliver lyrical smackdowns to those not worthy of partying. But beware - the stakes may or may not involve blowing up the city.

name: Wizardry: The Five Ordeals - The Absence of Misericordia
description:
It has been two years now, and the endless winter has not once relented, leaving many stranded in the settlement of Winternadir. The fur merchants come to the adventurers with a request...
The villagers often speak of a place of worship in the heart of a nearby valley. It was once home to "The Relic of Our Lady of Mercy", which was said to have kept the cold weather at bay. The relic is long since lost, and the valley has been abandoned. You must retrieve this relic, and return the region to its natural state.

name: The Zebra-Man!
description: The Zebra-Man! is a hyper-charged pixel art top down action game with brutal fist fights and blood spilling in your wake. You'll have to get out of impossible situations while unraveling time paradoxes and blasting the enemies you encounter along the way.

name: Basureroes: Invasion
description: “Basureroes: Invasion” is a 2D platform game with retro aesthetics in which a group of heroes with different abilities must save the world from an alien invasion. Run, jump and fight your way through twenty levels full of danger and epic boss fights.

name: Wander Hero
description: This is the fantasy of a two-dimensional traverser in a different world. You can take a leisurely and strategically deep adventure. You can also collect beautiful girls without hurting your wallet, and form your own harem... ahem, mercenary group.

name: Dead Letter Dept.
description: Dead Letter Dept. is a short horror game mystery experience, where you use your computer keyboard to type in various prompts, and attempt to decipher damaged images as oddities begin to appear.

name: CyberCorp
description: Brutal fast-paced top-down Co-op Loot Shooter in Cyberpunk world. Equipment-based combos. Exotic Weapons and Armor. Easy to start, hard to master. Play solo or with friends.

name: Cynoclept: The Game
description: Cynoclept: The Game is a nightmare brought to life. Kidnapped and kept within an abandoned government base, with no recollection of how you got there, you must escape with your life or be brought to your knees by those who control you.

name: Defender's Quest 2: Mists of Ruin
description: Defender's Quest II is set in a completely new world, with a brand new cast of characters and an entirely different story from last time.

name: Rocket League: Season 17 Rocketeer Pack
description: Unlock the Dingo car (Titanium White), Ultralex Wheels (Black), Interstellar Decal (Crimson), and Ambustion Boost (Titanium White) in the Season 17 Rocketeer Pack! You'll also get the Shark Attack Goal Explosion (Burnt Sienna) and 1000 Credits!

name: The Tower Of The Gods
description:
In The Tower Of The Gods, embark on a legendary mission to ascend a towering, mystical fortress. Each level of the tower is guarded by a formidable boss, an ancient deity, or a mythical creature, each with unique abilities and lethal strategies. With no minor enemies to slow you down, every battle is a titanic showdown that will test your skill and courage.

With every victory, you climb closer to the summit, where your destiny as a legendary hero awaits. The tower challenges not only your combat prowess but also your ability to unravel the mysteries and secrets of the gods. Will you overcome all the challenges and claim your place among the legends?

name: The End of Infinity Return
description: The End of Infinite Return is a story that unravels the fate and secrets of the secret agent Lexy as she goes on missions in a simulated world.Use a variety of firearms to defeat enemies and solve puzzles while deciding your own fate.

name: Somnus
description: SOMNUS is a first-person indie game in the genre of adventure with elements of horror. The protagonist, a young boy, faces a difficult ordeal: his mother is seriously ill, and in order to pay for her treatment, he takes a job as a night guard.

name: The Closing Shift
description: An interactive first-person horror game. Walk, look around, and talk to people to finish the short story about closing your restaurant. Complete the story with immersive sounds, and spooky tension and jumpscares to keep you focused.

name: Dino Crisis Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Dino Crisis 2
description: The legendary Dino Crisis 2 is back, fully playable on modern PCs.

name: Dino Crisis
description: Dino Crisis remastered to be fully playable on modern PCs by Capcom and GOG.

name: Hidden Cats: Spring Festival
description: Dive into the enchanting world of "Spring Festival" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Jiji...Love
description: A bullet hell game made in 48 hours for MalagaJam Weekend 19

name: No Man's Sky: Worlds Part II
description:
Update 5.50, WORLDS PART II, transforms the universe with new stars, new story, and new planets. Explore ancient ruins, gas giants and water worlds, and discover strange creatures, varied biomes and dramatic terrain. Featuring new gameplay, huge improvements in lighting and water rendering, and much more.

Our journey continues.

name: Plot Twist
description: Welcome to Plot Twist, where you take on the role of an ambitious writer in a world of stories and inspiration. You will manage your own writing career, create bestsellers, gain fans, and shape the history of literature! Your success depends on making the right decisions and your creativity!

name: Ropuka's Idle Island
description: A cozy idle game that sits anywhere on your desktop. Watch the frog cut grass, upgrade his tools, and decorate the island while you work or relax.

name: Squaser 3
description: Squaser 3 is a minimalist puzzle game where you control a white square and erase the darkness on each level. Clear your path using logic and memory!

name: Cho Aniki Collection
description:
Have you been hitting the gym?
The intensely muscular shooter is back!

name: Robot Anarchy
description:
The Retro 90’s FPS You’ve Been Waiting For!
The world is under siege by the ruthless robots of the MacroCyber corporation.

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Istanbul
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Istanbul landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Stellar Docks
description: Stellar puzzles, logic without limits!

name: Mutation
description: Mutation is a procedural Dungeon Crawler Roguelite with survival and RPG elements, set in a sci-fi Lovecraftian theme: gain experience, unlock skills and new items, face increasingly dangerous threats, and escape through different paths while exploring multiple levels and uncovering the organization's secrets.

name: Agent Fall
description: Infiltrate and destroy in side-scrolling shooter style!

name: Batography
description: Play as a curious bat on his mission to take a full fledged photo of the moon. Run, Climb, Glide and Snap your way through an array of obstacles while interacting with the cheeky characters in the neighbourhood. Can you collect all five moon cakes?

name: Achilles: Survivor
description: Achilles: Survivor is a dynamic single-player bullet heaven game where you face thousands of enemies, build destructive structures, develop your character to return as an even more powerful machine of destruction and survive waves of enemies.

name: Slasher: Origins
description: Slashers is a chaotic, 2.5D, auto-attack survival game with rogue-lite elements and noir-anime storytelling. Unlock powerful heroes, create builds of unique abilities, and survive the escalating inferno of Mephistopheles’ underworld.

name: Smol Survivors
description: Smol Survivors is a 2D reverse bullet-hell where you open portals to new worlds and then fight off hordes of hostile inhabitants. Collect weapons, upgrade them, then combine them into super weapons to wreak havoc!

name: Polaris
description: Team up and take flight in this sci-fi co-op shooter with fully destructible environments. Soar through dynamic open levels using powerful abilities, unearth the coveted secrets of Polaris, and lay waste to the hostile cityscapes of a colonizing threat— reclaim your homeworld!

name: Bellfortis
description: Control the people and armies, gain territory by force or cunning. Be a clever ruler or a ruthless conqueror in this Middle Ages game that combines turn-based strategy with intense real-time battles.

name: Cozy Campzone
description: “Seek trough the forest around and find all ingredients to make cozy camping coffee recipes!!"

name: HexaScape: Cyber Defense
description: Build your perfect defenses with hexagons! Use hex tiles to explore cyberspace, upgrade your defense towers, and complete quests in this unique turn-based strategy game. With a story campaign, a procedurally generated endless mode, and a powerful editor, HexaScape offers endless challenges.

name: DeTechtive 2112
description: DeTechtive 2112 is a co-op, stealth/action game from an isometric perspective with a linear storyline set in a cyber universe.

name: Ronny's Climb
description: Relive the 90s in this 16-bit inspired retro platformer! Explore colorful worlds alongside Ronny and their adorable furry friends and help them jump, dash and fight their way to the top of the mountain. Can you overcome the challenges and reach the summit?

name: Quantum Odyssey
description: Are you the One to solve the Puzzle of All Puzzles? Enter an award-winning adventure in the realm of Quantum Computing. Program hardware-ready algorithms, hack players, solve decision games, and unlock knowledge to convince Quantum-Enlightened Sages that you Master the Nature of Reality.

name: Cryptical Path
description: Cryptical Path is a thrilling rogue-lite dungeon crawler that pushes the boundaries of the genre. Play the Architect, build your own path, and navigate an ever-changing labyrinth you've been summoned in.

name: Runa & the Chaikurú Legacy
description: Help the brave adventurer Runa uncover the mysteries buried deep in the Ruins of the ancient Chaikurú civilization, in a classic and epic 3D action-adventure game. Explore a fantasy world inspired by South-American locations, nature and cultures.

name: The Kaiyo Mission
description: The Kaiyo Mission is a casual, 2.5D, single player, sci-fi based, underwater exploration game set on alien ocean worlds.

name: Level Zero: Extraction
description:
Level Zero: Extraction is a multiplayer extraction horror - a unique take on survival experience that blends the heart-pounding tension of asymmetric horrors with the high-stakes showdowns of extraction shooters.

Embark on a dangerous scavenging expedition where 3 teams of up to 3 mercenaries compete for loot and dare to come back. Or take on the role of two deadly alien monsters and hunt for human prey.

name: Top Dog
description: Dogfight your way through short, intense and randomized runs. Hard but easy to pickup, with daily leaderboards and minimum hardware requirements

name: Kamibako: Mythology of Cube
description: "Crafting" x "Puzzles" x "Battle" x "RPG" !? A game system that evokes a unique new game genre that will give you a brand new experience. Become the "Restorer" who aims to save the world by finding solutions to the "great division" and "fragmentation", the world's...

name: Grief Like a Stray Dog
description: An isolated Russian village, 1942. Men leave one by one, along the winding forest path painted crimson by distant fires, and do not return. Yong Nadia becomes a part-time postwoman filling in for her sick mother. She is now a messenger of hope and of trouble.

name: Coridden
description: Become the beasts you defeat in this action-packed RPG! Equip and upgrade both your human and beast form and shapeshift between them anytime. Venture out solo or ride together in co-op on a journey to uncover the dark secrets sealed away inside a legendary city.

name: Level Z
description: Level Z is a tactical online first-person horror game, where the first team, the surviving scientists, must evacuate from the space station where a biological accident has occurred. The second team, the dangerous creatures, must prevent the escape and neutralize all survivors on the spacestation.

name: The End of the Sun
description: The End of the Sun is a first-person exploration and adventure story-based game, embedded in the Slavic world. This is a series of mysterious events that ordinary people dealt with, as they were living in a small village where the line between myth and reality became to fade perilously.

name: Tails of Iron 2: Whiskers of Winter - Deluxe Upgrade
description:
Prepare for the chilling clash against the Dark Wings with the Tails of Iron 2: Whiskers of Winter Deluxe Upgrade, featuring both the ‘Augur of the Draugr' armour and weapon pack and ‘Hair to the Throne' cosmetic DLC. Base game required.

Step into the fray clad in the legendary Draugr armour of old, forged in the fires of the elder wars between Rat and Bat, before choosing between six different, warrior-worthy hair and beard styles. For those who seek to claim victory over winter's shadow, only the fiercest attire will do.

name: City Transport Simulator: Tram - Deluxe Edition
description: Become a tram driver, so hop into the cab for the ultimate tram driving experience! In addition to the three real-world trams included in the Standard edition (ULF B1, R2.2b, or ULF A1), the Deluxe edition also includes the StadtRegioTram and the Type D Vienna! Get ready to hit the streets of Tramau.

name: Tails of Iron 2: Whiskers of Winter - Deluxe Edition
description: Prepare for the chilling clash against the Dark Wings with the Tails of Iron 2: Whiskers of Winter Deluxe Edition, combining the brutal action-RPG base game with both the ‘Augur of the Draugr' armour and weapon pack and ‘Hair to the Throne' cosmetic DLC.

name: The Stone of Madness: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: City Transport Simulator: Tram - Collector's Edition
description: Become a tram driver, so hop into the cab for the ultimate tram driving experience! In addition to the five real-world trams included in the Standard and Deluxe editions (ULF B1, R2.2b, ULF A1, StadtRegioTram, and Type D Vienna), the Collector's edition also includes the E1 Vienna and the GT8N Mannheim

name: Bubble Dreams 3D
description:
Gogi the rabbit has misplaced his collection of precious rainbow gems... and they've all fallen into several different 3D dream worlds!

Using his magic bubble ball, help Gogi get his gems back by rolling, drifting, bouncing, and boosting your way through a handful of shiny platforming stages without falling off!

name: The Reformatory
description: Your name is Dewey. You enjoy playing video games, much to the dismay of your parents. One day, they send you to a reformatory. There, a man electroshocks you. In convulsions, you fall into a world filled with enemies. This is a top-down 2D pixel-style shooter game with roguelite elements.

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Crewmate
description: Emergency meeting! Is it a monkey... or an Impostor? Find out with the Crewmate.

name: Tails of Iron & Tails of Iron 2: Standard Bundle
description: The Rats exact revenge against the Frogs & Dark Wings with this ‘Tails’ bundle.

name: Tails of Iron & Tails of Iron 2: Deluxe Bundle
description: Tails of Iron 2: Whiskers of Winter and Tails of Iron are bundled together with their DLCs in this ultimate 'tail' and action-RPG experience.

name: Neptunia Riders vs. Dogoos: Deluxe Edition
description: Make sure you gear up with the Goddesses with the Deluxe Edition! The Deluxe Edition also includes the Neptunia Riders VS Dogoos Costume Set!

name: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 - Season 2
description: Season 02 is here, upending the new order of Avalon. Engage with a massive amount of new content, including five Multiplayer maps, more than six new weapons, a new Zombies map, limited time Valentine’s Day-themed modes, and more. Gear up and deploy to Season 02.

name: Vampires in your area
description: Single vampires nearby are waiting to chat with you!

name: Mr. Hopp's Playhouse 2 HD
description: A young girl confronts eerie manifestations and deciphers cryptic puzzles as she sets out to defeat three cursed toys and rescue her friends.

name: Little Lighthouse of Horror
description: A pixel art psychological horror game inspired by the Flannan Isles mystery. Manage a remote lighthouse, handle limited resources, and confront eerie occurrences as isolation erodes your sanity. Multiple endings await based on your choices and actions. How long can you last?

name: Crashed
description: Crashed is a third-person stealth game where you play as B.O.B., stranded on the quirky planet SnamSam. The mission? Rebuild the craft and escape! You'll sneak through restricted areas and take daring routes. A splash of humour as B.O.B.'s detachable head knocks off the Snailmen's heads!

name: Zombie Tide Incoming Final Defense
description: This is a refined third-person shooter game combined with tower defense elements.

name: Galactic Simulator
description: Galactic Simulator is a clicker game based on the Fermi Paradox and the Great Filter theory. Players can simulate the evolution of celestial bodies and civilizations in the galaxy from an observer's perspective. The game supports multiplayer mode. Create a unique galaxy with friends!

name: Trashcan Simulator
description: The moment you throw something into the trash can is an exciting moment in your daily life. Through this game, you can enjoy the exciting moments of your life over and over again! You might discover something new by staring at the trash can in the room.

name: Slide to Solve
description: Slide to Solve is a minimalistic & relaxing puzzle game

name: Can No One Hear Me?
description: All you have to do is press a key and speak into your microphone... But which key?

name: Final Redoubt: Zombie Apocalypse
description: Survive the onslaught, manage your ammo, and endure in Final Redoubt, a relentless survival shooter where every bullet, every swing, and every decision counts!

name: Chat is Real
description: A short horror game of a few minutes, with elements of combat and fear. You play as a streamer known as "Gargamelovo let's play šílenství" He always felt like an outsider, whether at school or at work. So he started talking to chat.

name: Southside Racing
description: Race and battle using weapons and karts themed after Vtubers and content creators! All characters in game can be found livestreaming on Twitch. Race through different Vtuber themed levels like TomaKey's Liminal Spaces or Meat's Silly Safari and slow each other down with weapons!

name: Leaving Whisper at Night
description: Leaving Whisper at Night is a free, exploration-based indie game that tells the story of the protagonist, Yuniga, and their experiences throughout the game.

name: Atomic Heart: Enchantment Under the Sea
description: Enchantment Under the Sea goes back to the spectacular combat gameplay that made Atomic Heart one of the highlights of 2023, as players continue the main storyline with the Twins’ consciousness at their side and new weapons in their arsenal. Meet new and returning characters while diving into the mysteries of the underwater Neptune Research Center to find a way to save humanity from a dismal future. Players will also revisit familiar locations from Facility 3826 that have changed beyond recognition, like the flying city of Chelomey, now under the robots’ total control.

name: Sniper Elite: Resistance - Deluxe Edition
description:
2-Day Early Unlock
1 Weapon Skin
Karabiner 98 Rifle
M1911 Pistol
Target Führer Campaign Mission (2-Day Early Unlock)
Season Pass

name: Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O.
description:
Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. takes the gameplay of Virtua Fighter 5 and raises it to new levels! Rollback Netcode support, gorgeous 4K visuals and additional content make it the best version of this legendary game ever.

The legendary fighting series makes its Steam debut with Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O.! Challenge the greatest fighters in the world in the ultimate remaster of the classic 3D fighter,now featuring Rollback netcode support, gorgeous 4K graphics, and all the bone-crunching, martial arts combat of the renowned original. Battle through classic VF modes like Arcade or Rank Match, create your own custom online tournaments and leagues with up to 16 players, or learn from the best in Spectator Mode. Master your fighting style to defeat all challengers in the Fifth World Fighting Tournament and become a Virtua Fighter legend!

name: Cosmic Raze
description: Cosmic Raze is a sci-fi tower defense strategy game. Control advanced weapons, build powerful synergies, and then blast away as aliens attempt to conquer Earth. Between rounds you'll earn unique augmentations, purchase and upgrade a huge variety of weapons, and unlock powerful synergy bonuses.

name: Shining Hero
description: A single-player roguelike game with pixel art that blends deck-building with grid-based turn-based strategy.

name: School Fighter
description: School Fighter is a top-down arena roguelite shooter where you play as a student who fights off school enemies using paper airplanes. You have access to a school shop, unique perks, and an upgrade station to help you create a powerful character and overcome the school nightmare!

name: Mysteries of Perception
description:
Mysteries of Perception is a detective game where you will see the same scene through the eyes of different characters. Uncover their secrets by analyzing all the clues. Switch perspectives and learn everything about the artifacts of the Distant and the deaths in their wake. Glory to the Stars!

Mysteries of Perception is a 2D investigative game structured like a choral narrative where you can jump from one character's perspective to another during the investigation. To gather more clues and progress in your investigation, it will be necessary to collect information from all viewpoints and confront them to reach plausible conclusions. Confirm your theories by consulting the stars. Jump from a past to a future perspective and discover every facet of the mysterious deaths that will be presented to you.

Dive into this dystopian universe with desaturated colors and solve the mysteries that govern the world. Perhaps you will uncover the mystery of your own death...

name: Carmen Sandiego
description: The scarlet super thief Carmen Sandiego is back! Adorn Carmen’s signature red hat and play as the vigilante herself to navigate a world of espionage, utilizing high-tech gadgets, and ultimately capturing VILE. Rookie gumshoes and seasoned detectives are invited to put their sleuthing skills to the test whether it’s in the narrative driven main campaign or the classic mode ‘The Acme Files’.

name: Dodge 2
description: Bullet hell with the mouse.

name: Orcs Must Die! Deathtrap
description: Orcs Must Die! Deathtrap is an action-packed third-person shooter and trap defense game. Evolve as an orc-slaying War Mage through rogue-lite choices and obliterate, eviscerate, and incinerate massive hordes with up to four players.

name: Eternal Strands
description: Fight epic, towering creatures while blending magical abilities with an arsenal of powerful weapons to keep the world from crumbling in this third-person, action-adventure game.

name: Tails of Iron II: Whiskers of Winter
description: Embark upon a vast, snow-ravaged kingdom in Tails of Iron 2, sequel to the critically acclaimed action-RPG. As Arlo, heir to the Warden of the Wastes, adventure through harsh northern lands, home to giant beasts and ragtag bandits, in an epic quest to overcome an ancient, blood-starved evil.

name: City Transport Simulator: Tram
description:
Become a tram driver! Hop back into the cab for the ultimate tram driving experience. Drive modern real-world trams from various cities with physics indistinguishable from the real thing.

Take to the rails and transport passengers while sticking to the timetable and strategically set up your own tram routes by choosing from the many stations to build up a fully functioning and effective tram network.

name: Beat the Humans
description: Beat the Humans is a turn-based tactical RPG where you lead a squad of aliens against human invaders. Gather your squad, fight, collect artifacts and explore the star system map to survive and win.

name: The Mute House
description: Inspired by old and classic survival horror games, The Mute House combines exploration, management, puzzles and a touch of action. As Emily investigates about her sister's vanishing, she finds herself trapped in a mysterious mansion.

name: Army of Tentacles: Assault on Rainbow Unicorn Island
description: Classic story of monster boy falls in love with human girl, and then there's a war. Train and fight with the power of love and weapons in this party-based RPG!

name: Six Legends
description:
Six Legends is a narrative point & click game with a few minigames.
It tells the story of six young dragons, exploring forbidden parts of the world around them, and slowly changing how their own world works.
Play as all six characters as they go through friendships and life-changing encounters, in a journey of self-discovery and growth.

name: Absentis
description: Adventure game with RPG elements in which you have to take on the role of a young and ambitious traveler named Jack, for whom a trip to a frightening, but alluring island with its secrets turned out to have completely unexpected consequences.

name: Exogate Initiative
description: Build and manage mankind's first worlds exploration program. Build your infrastructures underground, recruit international specialists and send them on missions across the universe through the Exogate.

name: The Stone of Madness
description: From the studio that brought you the Blasphemous series comes The Stone of Madness: a real-time tactical stealth game set in an 18th-century Spanish Monastery. Located in the Pyrenees, this time-worn Jesuit monastery is home to a madhouse and an inquisitorial prison. Five prisoners - plagued by cruel punishment, madness, and despair - pool their skills and resources to face their phobias, stave off insanity, uncover the mysteries of the Monastery, and find a way to escape.

name: Akazukin-chan no Omimai
description: Sin descripción

name: Under the Sea: A Hidden World of Wonders
description: On a vibrant underwater reef, three very different friends embark on an extraordinary adventure. Learn their story in this beautiful visual novel.

name: Rebirth
description: Sin descripción

name: DevTycoon
description: DevTycoon is a software development business simulation with a charming pixel art style, which challenges you to build and manage your own company in a world where competition is fierce and the challenges reflect real life.

name: Sprout Crafter
description: A farm simulation game where you cultivate nature, run a farm, and enjoy colorful interactions. Develop your farm by planting crops, harvesting, caring for animals, crafting, and exploring.

name: Into The Depths
description: Escape the lab and survive through dangerous monsters and military personnel

name: Wendigo Blue
description: Action-packed 2D beat-em-up with intense boss battles and a large variety of customizable equipment and skills. Up to 4 players with local co-op.

name: Dying Light: 10th Anniversary Bundle
description: Released to celebrate the 10th Anniversary of Dying Light, this bundle includes the certified Hotshot Outfit, the invaluable Dawnbreaker shotgun, the radiant Sunburst revolver, and the glimmering Golden Idol machete. The gilded appearance of each item is a testament to everything you accomplished in Harran. This bundle also features the Golden Hour buggy paint job, symbolizing your role as a beacon of hope for survivors and a formidable force against enemies.

name: Neptunian Nightmare
description: Neptunian Nightmare is a vanilla mapset and partial conversion for The Ultimate Doom (-complevel 3). It's an atmospheric romp heavily inspired by the Doom Bible and its associated prototypes, as well as Team TNT's TNT: Evilution and Icarus: Alien Vanguard.

name: In the Facade we Trust
description: You’re torn between a girl who obsessed with you and a creature. Whose words can lead you out of this endless and dangerous loop? Which "you" are you? Who is the real monster? Trust the right person in the right cycle to get closer to the exit, or be misled by facades, complicating your next loop.

name: Tragedy at Ashville Lane
description: Dive into a psychological horror experience and try to uncover the mystery at Ashville Lane. Step into the shadows of your fears and face them to figure out what happened that day. Survival is your only option and remaining hidden is a must.

name: Back in Service: A Metro Driver
description: Join the adventure and become the master of the Prague metro in our game, which takes you into the underground world of the capital city. Explore stations and overcome challenges on the tracks from the cabin of a historic train. Can you complete the route, transport all passengers, and avoid delays?

name: The SS Destiny Disaster
description: Humanity's ambition for the stars turns into a brutal fight for survival. The crew of The SS Destiny discovers a bacteria that turns their mission into a nightmare. Find resources, battle infected, and escape the doomed ship as it spirals into chaos.

name: Darkest Dungeon II: Inhuman Bondage
description: Plunge your stagecoach into the long-forgotten Catacombs beneath the Kingdom and face a corrosive, oozing threat! Uncover powerful items in this new mini-region, and gain access to The Abomination, a fearsome new playable hero with unique battle mechanics.

name: AmidaDaMida
description: Sin descripción

name: Sum10
description: Sin descripción

name: 60 BPM
description: 60 Beats per Minute is the rhythm of a healthy heart at rest, but be ready to speed it up! Play 42 levels by tapping on-beat with the music following sound and visual cues. Enjoy spectacular surprises, with soothing music and visuals from the calm of a starry night to the rush of heated battles!

name: 101 Cats Hidden in New Delhi
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the New Delhi landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Space Engineers 2
description: Space Engineers 2 is an open world sandbox game where engineering meets exploration, construction, and survival in the vastness of space. Become a pioneer in the distant Almagest system, a new uncharted world with infinite possibilities for creativity and discovery. Build everything from starships to space stations as you craft your own path in this highly anticipated next chapter of the Space Engineers series!

name: Camelbirds
description: Saddle up a giant bird and race to victory. Overtake your rivals, use various tools, and overcome obstacles on thrilling tracks. Prove you're the best rider in these wild races!

name: Claritas
description: Sin descripción

name: BlockWorld Ai
description: RPG puzzle game in which players train a mysterious AI, Hoshihabito-kun, who learns how to move puzzles and the results, and fight powerful bosses together with players

name: Circuit Runner
description: Circuit Runner is a fast-paced cyberpunk game where you collect resources to escape a dystopian tower. Use active and passive skills to outwit enemies and overcome obstacles. Compete on Leaderboards for ultimate bragging rights in this thrilling race for freedom.

name: Bloxolotl
description: Bloxolotl is a cozy puzzle game all about cute block-shaped Axolotls and connecting them together.

name: Knights of the Round Peg
description: Journey through Knights of the Round Peg's magical world with a brave lute-playing knight as you overcome peg obstacles!

name: Phantom Beast Solitaire
description: Each start will have a different beginning. The game is set in a cartoon style, with simple and fresh graphics. Players need to deal high damage to defeat their boss through playing cards to clear the level. Suitable for players who enjoy challenges, randomness, and creativity.

name: Besotted
description: Dive into the world of Besotted. A classic JRPG 2D-3D art style set in a fantasy world with 3 main protagonist. Each with their own deep back stories that's full of death, revenge, love, and destiny. Join the 3 as they team up together all with the same goal in mind.

name: Arrogue
description: Collect, upgrade and unlock powerful arrows and relics to protect and restore your village. For that you’ll have to fight against procedurally generated hordes of enemies in this turn-per-turn, physics-based, roguelike! Explore the map, find the right path and make decisive choices in random events.

name: Enkate
description: An action-rpg multiplayer with rogue-like influences, in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Darkest Dungeon II: Kingdoms
description: Kingdoms is a free standalone campaign game mode coming to Darkest Dungeon II. This new game mode challenges players in a desperate race against the clock to find and defeat a monstrous threat before it overwhelms and destroys the Kingdom. Journey across the land to gather resources and battle evil incursions, all while defending a network of safe haven Inns.

name: Unreachable
description: A first-person investigative thriller where your family is kidnapped and you must carry out various demands from the kidnapper in order to prolong their lives. However, if you are sharp, you might also uncover clues to track down their location and devise a rescue plan.

name: Undomestic
description: Uncover forgotten secrets on a secluded medieval island. Journey through a dynamic world influenced by time and weather. Build, battle, and unravel the enigma. Shape the destiny of this captivating adventure.

name: Those Who Rule
description: Join three fresh recruits caught in a web of betrayal as war looms over the land. Lead your band of heroes through tactical turn-based battles, master unique abilities, and forge powerful gear to turn the tide of battle. Will you unravel the conspiracy driving the conflict—or be consumed by it?

name: Rat Memory
description: RAT MEMORY is a 3D platformer game with exploration, in which you will have to complete tasks, such as collecting items and coins, and overcome challenges as a rat trying to discover his present and change his future.

name: Camping Simulator: The Squad
description: Camping Simulator lets you experience what camp means by preparing your backpack wisely for challenging conditions of nature. You can play all the experiences with up to four friends in multiplayer mode or single player mode.

name: Learning Factory
description: A base building game with a relaxing atmosphere and complex structure. Build a giant factory on a multi-layered map, gather resources, craft and sell items to cats, collect cat data and process it with machine learning to establish Catopia on Mars!

name: Battle Realms: Zen Edition
description:
Ed Del Castillo (producer of Command & Conquer) proudly presents the return of his masterpiece: Battle Realms.

Critically acclaimed and enjoyed by fans worldwide, Battle Realms is packed with innovation, deep strategy, and an immersive world filled with meaningful detail. It's a game defined by its setting - an RTS that combines resource management, unit development, and tactical gameplay with storytelling inspired by the Kung Fu movies and oriental culture.

If you missed it the first time, now is your chance to experience one of the most innovative RTS's in the genre. Even though the original Battle Realms came out almost two decades ago, many of its features have yet to be copied in other games. With unique units and many original ideas Battle Realms is a game that no RTS fan can afford to miss.

name: SCP: Fragmented Minds
description: Fragmented Minds explores the reality in which The Foundation fails to contain a breach after a cataclysmic XK-Scenario. You will awaken in the derelict depths of Mars Site-113 to discover what happened, and piece together the solution to the most devastating event humanity has ever seen.

name: Cynthia: Hidden in the Moonshadow - Anniversary Edition
description: Emotional, 3rd-person, story-driven, adventure game focused on solving puzzles and using stealth mechanics. Use your bow to interact with environmental elements. Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

name: Vendrán las aves
description: You bought a guitar with your severance pay. And you have enough savings to do without a job for a year. So you've decided to devote some time to yourself.

name: Laundry Room Dilemma
description: You find yourself amnesiac and trapped in a laundry room. You can earn food by working. Who built this place? How do you escape?

name: Living With It
description:
Welcome
Instructions for this training will be delivered via memo.

name: Pogo Epoch: Impossible 99%
description: It’s a game where you bounce on a Pogo Stick and try to climb a massive tower full of tricky obstacles. Take on the impossible challenge—one unlucky slip, and you’re back at the bottom. Pure focus solo or chaotic fun with friends

name: Rise of Kenshin
description: Demons invasion, the young heroes face the heavy siege of the enemy, they fought in blood and finally recovered the lost land. This is a national style Roguelike casual game, players can play a variety of roles, gradually grow, and experience the hearty grass-cutting battles.

name: You Draw, I Guess
description: An online pictionary game of drawing and guessing. The game has 4 modes and supports up to 10 players in a group. You can select a prompt and draw a picture for other players to guess. You can also guess on others' drawings. Time to test your drawing and guessing skills!

name: Egg Ascent
description: Launch yourself through tough but fair platforming challenges with the power of eggs in this suck and spit momentum based platformer!

name: Princess & Blade
description: A Clothing collection ARPG.Creatively to sets properties according to the appearance of the clothes. Hundreds of clothes for the protagonist to enjoy, experience different battle strategies because of different clothes.Fight accompany sexy,beauty or to become a heavily armored angel.

name: Type Help
description: A puzzle-mystery game inspired by Return of the Obra Dinn, Her Story, Unheard and The Roottrees are Dead.

name: Half-Life: Savior Complex
description: You play as a scientist that got himself lost in Xen during the resonance cascade and you have to find your way back to Earth and escape. The mod is a short, old-school inspired project that has been in development for the past year and will feature 5 maps that spans across Xen and Black Mesa

name: Sayonara Sigil Sentry
description:
ALERT - ALERT - ALERT

Massive, unknown, hostile, fae-type entities are coming.

Pilot the Sigil Sentry.

Draw city-scale, looping fae name runes my marking their points with floating, spinning sigils.

name: Outbreak: The Fall of Cypress Ridge Collection
description: Return to the world of '90s survival horror in these action packed nightmares!

name: Mayéutica
description:
Only one can get the job. Review their resumes, ask them questions and find out what they hide under their skin. Every second counts.
Mayéutica is a narrative experience about four job candidates. Through their answers, they will discover truths hidden from themselves until they explode. Designed and programmed in 48 hours to participate in the Global Game Jam 2025, with the theme “Bubble”. Recognition for best narrative by the Francisco de Vitoria University.

name: Starling
description: Starling is a student made third person base-building exploration game. As an employee of Starling Corp., your mission is to gather resources from across the galaxy. After an unexpected turn of events, you will need to rebuild your base while being assisted by adorable creatures known as starlings.

name: Grand Theft Bubble
description: Join an ordinary person as he goes about his work: wrapping objects in bubble wrap. Maybe then you can relax after a hard day preparing orders...

name: Stickman Odyssey
description: Will you conquer the odyssey and emerge victorious?

name: Soccer Goal Run
description: Sin descripción

name: Golf Loop
description: Sin descripción

name: Hoarding Simulator 2.0
description: Sleep, train, ride a bike—almost anything is possible in this game. All you need to do is collect!

name: Toasty Tires
description:
You're playing with your toys in your bedroom when your parent comes in and asks you to clean up. Can you pick up your room and escape before it's too late? Or take your car for a spin in endless mode, where the carpet is never-ending. Just enjoy the ride.

Zip around the carpet and hardwood floor across Five unique levels as things get weirder and weirder. Explore and maybe by the end you'll uncover what's wrong with your parent before it's too late. Add avocado (and a little extra challenge) to your Toasty Tires experience with Avocado Edition!

name: Subway Exorcist Girl
description: A subway train plagued by strange occurrences. A part-time exorcist girl arrives to confront the supernatural chaos, with the unknown ahead.

name: MeiaUm: Escaping the Pix
description: In MeiaUm: Escaping the Pix, you dive into a digital world where precious bits are scattered across every level. Your mission? Collect them—but there's a big risk: the Pix. One touch from this ruthless system can be fatal, and the threat is always lurking. As you progress, the challenges grow tougher, and you'll need agility and sharp thinking to dodge the danger and grab all the bits before the Pix catches you. Every move could be your last chance.

name: The Demon Lord’s Daughter and the Tower of Seals
description: In the wake of the Demon Lord’s defeat, his daughter, Lilina, finds herself leading a miserable existence without any of the comforts of the castle she once called home. Now she has to make an honest living while seeking out six fabled talismans in an attempt to regain her lost powers!

name: Walk Zero1
description: The distant future... There are almost no people left on planet Earth, everyone has moved to Mars. The age of prosperity, the age of robots, androids, technology. And then one day, robot Zero1 decided to take a walk around planet Earth. What awaits him? Desert? Vast forests? Who will he meet on his way? All this is to be found out in the walking simulator.

name: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City - Nextgen Edition
description: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City - Nextgen Edition is a total conversion mod for Grand Theft Auto IV. It includes every mission and side content from the 2002 original game. Bringing the city, pedestrians, cars and even radio stations to the Rockstar Advanced Game Engine (RAGE).

name: Car Heist Simulator: Thief Mechanic
description: The city’s most prized cars, waiting for the perfect thief.

name: Dot
description: Do something to the pixel and trigger something to happen in the game.

name: Catcha
description: Catcha is a catching game where you shoot bombs and bosses, not your average catching game...

name: Sexdivers
description: SEXDIVERS is an intense survival shooter where you play as a fighter escorting a scientific expedition on a mysterious uninhabited planet.

name: Car-Toon Chaos
description: Car-toon Chaos is an action-packed game where high-speed chases and combat converge. Play as a vigilante driver with fully loaded automatic weapons, pursuing criminals by day and evading colossal dinosaurs by night. Playable on both PC and VR.

name: Time To Live
description: A story of living with a woman whose identity remains unknown for 30 days.

name: UFO Blast
description: Blast the UFOs that appear in space to earn XP and gold. Spin the spinner earn more gold. Open cards and buy new equipments or abilities for your SpaceShip . Advance through waves and try to reach the final boss.

name: Sae
description: SAE takes you to a dreamlike yet perilous tropical island chain in the South Pacific. Survive the natural perils, gather resources, and find your way back to civilization.

name: Datura Time
description:
Datura Time is a third-person action-adventure game that catapults you into a realm swirling with mystery, suspense, and dynamic action. This captivating world is a tribute to the 90's console games era, handcrafted with love and passion by a single-developer, Vladeta Stojanovic, with an infusion of post-Soviet and Eastern European aesthetics.

You, the player, are plunged into an enigmatic alternative reality known as the "Zone" after an accidental encounter with a peculiar drug - "Datura". Here, you'll cross paths with a host of characters, some allies, some foes, all delivering a singular message - you are an outsider and the unfolding reality is more than meets the eye.

As you navigate this perilous world, you'll unravel the Zone's hidden truths - it's a metaphysical limbo, home to the souls of Eastern Europe and the former Soviet Union, currently under the control of malevolent entities. This sinister realm is in desperate need of a true hero - a role YOU never expected but must now embrace. Your mission? Survive, defeat the wicked forces, restore balance, and return home.

name: Jaded
description: Platform and fight your way through mountains and forests to accomplish your purpose as a Jade being. Slow down time using your 360-degree directional dash, and lock on to targets to strike! Fight soldiers and creatures on your quest in this gem of a game.

name: Summer Islands
description:
Be the right businessman and build a unique holiday paradise. Become rich and enlarge your paradise. But be on the lookout for your competitors and the unpredictable weather.

Summer Islands – In this diversified economic simulation you have the possibility to build an indescribable holiday paradise.

Build cottages, villas or expensive hotels, right on the beach or in the mountains. When a building has been completed, the tourists can come by boat or plane.

Then the difficulty begins: build bars, discos, golf courses, supermarkets and many other buildings, which are popular by the tourists and let you as the owner become rich. But do not forget their surroundings. The many catastrophes that can occur and your enemies who also want to depend on the cake. You should always keep an eye on your vacation paradise.

name: ReSpaced
description: A fast-paced first-person shooter where you master gun recoil to leap across platforms, battle various enemies, and upgrade your weapon to escape an overrun space station.

name: Cube 2x1 RailFarm
description: This package includes two puzzle games: Cube Farmer, where you place cubes to irrigate crops, and Cube Railway, where you build tracks to guide trains to their destination. Enjoy 40 challenging levels in each game!

name: M.A.D. Cows and D.U.M.B. Ducks Bundle
description:
Better together!

M.A.D. Cows is an exciting, retro, action platform game. Mow down aliens. Buy better guns. Rescue cows, dogs, raccoons, and more.

D.U.M.B. Ducks is an action-filled, retro platform game. Slaughter giant snails. Battle gigantic beasts. Buy better guns. Blow up walls. Collect fat stacks of cash.

name: Fruit Stand Fortune
description: Start with nothing and spin your way to the top! Gather fruit from slot machines and sell them to buy upgrades, new fruit types, and more! Unlock cute customers! Meet a Bear Wizard! Build your fruit empire with Fruit Stand Fortune!

name: Nusnur
description: Explore the multiverse with different versions of NUSNURs where every universe has its own mechanics, style, story, and lore. Observe how their lives connect and how everything ends.

name: Cyber Tank 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Memento Mori
description: It's a VR-style room escape game that immerses the mystery and horror atmosphere, acquiring items and performing gimmicks and quizzes to escape this place..

name: Hungry in Dungeon
description: A bite-sized Game Boy eat-em-up made in GB Studio. Escape the Tomb of Eetemhup in a first-person dungeon crawler style, but with fast paced action combat. 7 short but difficult levels in total. Lots of mysterious creatures to eat.

name: Pokemon Emerald Imperium
description: A new Rom hack has all pokemon up to gen 9. Its a game made in the art and style of pokemon Emerald. New teams given to trainers, difficulty accross the board. Level caps are in the game. New mega pokemon.

name: The Jumping Onion Ring
description: Sin descripción

name: Wave Buxters
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Shop Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Popoposan
description: 'She' spoke 'something' and chased after me. Back then, running away was the only thing I was good at. At home and at school, I had no place where I belonged, and I always wanted someone to play with. "POPOPOSAN" is an adventure game based on urban legends.

name: /R
description: Run, hide, adapt and survive in a mansion of endless night and bizarre brain-twisting phenomena in this 2D hand-drawn psychological horror title.

name: I Am Here, I Won't Disappear. I Am Here, I Won't...
description: A black-white-and-red visual novel about a girl afraid of disappearing. And a bit about her cat.

name: Cat Rescue
description: A desperate woman fights to rescue her cat from a paranoid streamer’s lair of twisted experiments, puzzles, and lurking horrors in this psychological thriller.

name: Shadows Over Whispering Pines
description: A first-person mystery adventure where you solve puzzles, answer calls, and navigate dangers as a nightwatch in a secluded wilderness park.

name: The Motel
description: Work the late-night shift at The Motel, an old roadside stop near Oakhill Grove. Complete simple tasks until a news broadcast reveals a dangerous killer is nearby. Can you survive the night?

name: The Ultimate Detective Bundle
description: Includes Cluedo: Classic Edition and Cluedo!

name: Casual Sport Series: Tennis
description: Ready your racket, find your rhythm, and dominate the court!

name: Puzzle Adventures: Serve Dishes
description: Easy to use puzzles for toddlers and kids. Featuring funny and cute animal motifs with 30 unique puzzles. 100% frustration free and child-safe.

name: Global Transport
description: Global Transport is a fun and engaging game that will test your problem-solving and time-management skill

name: Pirates Never Die
description: Pirates Never Die is a third-person horror zombie game set in a chilling, atmospheric world where players must uncover the mysteries of a cursed island. Play as Deacon, a young pirate in search for his brother after rumors of his disappearance. Faced with a new reality the fight for survival begins.

name: Don't Get Got
description: DON’T GET GOT is a multiplayer co-op horror game of deception. You’re locked inside and something is out to get you. Find the key. Use the environment and collaborate with other players until they no longer serve your needs. Make it to the safe room. Survival not guaranteed.

name: Paranormal Mutagens: Cargo
description: Paranormal Mutagens: Cargo is a first-person eldritch horror game. Manage a spacecraft and its passengers while battling eerie anomalies and struggling to survive the chaos unfolding aboard. Can you endure the horrors and complete your mission?

name: Little Robot
description: Join me on my first game as an Indie Dev with this casual 15-minute exploration game where players navigate the backyard, as our favorite sad robot, collecting essential components to successfully return indoors!

name: Rome: Nightmares of Empire
description: Rome: Nightmares of Empire is an Action game with RPG elements, charming pixel graphics and interesting mechanics. Defeat your opponents, acquire and create equipment, improve your skills to face the great threat, rise up, hero and save Rome !

name: Parkour Assassin: Sprint Run
description: A 3D parkour game in a cyberpunk style, where you can experience breathtaking speeds, dodge various traps, and continuously break through to achieve the furthest distance. Terrifying bombs and robotic enemies will stand in your way, but you can use the quick blade in your hand to slash through them!

name: The 8ight
description: Max, who suffers from schizophrenia due to childhood trauma, decides to break free from the endless torment of hallucinations and delusions.

name: A Few Days With: Bianca
description: Embark on a sensual butterfly-hunting adventure with Bianca, a charming young woman. In this hidden object game, explore each location to discover what lies beneath Bianca's enticing layers.

name: Menticide
description: Menticide is an endless runner where you protect a man running from himself. You draw lines to bounce the man around, block off enemies and cut through obstacles. Through strong symbolism and procedural rhetoric we are using the game as an analogue for mental health.

name: Benign Land
description: A short, dreamlike experience where you drift through haunting scenes set in Ireland, from pagan times to recent historical events, revolving around the Troubles of Northern Ireland.

name: Sliding Cubes 2048 Mania
description: Merge, strategize, and conquer—reach 2048 in this addictive puzzle phenomenon!

name: The Bakery Tales
description: Where every recipe tells a story, and every loaf builds a legacy.

name: Unaccessible
description: Unaccessible is a third-person wheelchair platformer about struggling to get a health insurance claim approved on a mysterious island without accessibility ramps. Tackle stairs, climb obstacles and hop your way through the pain of the claims approval process.

name: Wukong Fight in Kaoria
description: This is a single player action adventure game that includes mythological themed character actions and role-playing, You can use regular attacks and skills, spells, such as magic, celestial phenomena, and body fixing spells, to Fight and defeat the enemies you encounter.

name: MyPopgoes: New and Improved!
description: myPopgoes has been reprogrammed from scratch, with countless fixes, optimisations, and brand new features! New and Improved! is out NOW as a free update to the game on Steam.

name: Stand: Survive, Team-up, And Never Die
description: STAND is a tower defence in a post-apocalyptic environment. Other survivors can join you, but also lots of upgrades. Combine weapons with items. Make a spinning flamethrower or install barbed wire to face the hordes ! Survive, Team-up, And Never Die !

name: One Room Dungeon
description: A roguelike team builder, auto-battler meets inventory management, where you are a little dungeon keeper who has to fit minions, artifacts, and items in a very tidy way in his tiny one-room dungeon to empower himself to protect the dungeon from the raiding adventurers.

name: Lunavania
description: Lunavania is an Anime pixel horizontal action shooting game with unique pixel art style and roguelite elements.The game has rich build structures, over a hundred different styles of weapons, equipment, skills, which can be infinitely stacked and freely combined to experience the fun of meat pigeons.

name: I Commissioned Some Dogs 4
description: I paid more artists to hide dogs and bones in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Wait: The Patient
description: Wait: The Patient is a non-combat mystery horror game, that takes place in the 90s and follows the story of Dr. Alice Fincher. After a new patient arrives in the mental hospital she works in, strange events start to unfold.

name: Crimson Snow Deluxe
description: CRIMSON SNOW DELUXE: A psychological horror RPG where you destroy the world you've created...

name: Horny Mage Chronicles
description: A succubus has attacked your home, leaving you the only one to have escaped. A mysterious witch has rescued you, and proposes that you defeat the succubus... with your body?

name: Living with Temptation: American Sunset
description: The new edition of a classic Living with Temptation contains all expansions, with redesigned gameplay, refreshed visuals, and a lot of new content. Relationship simulator where you may try to stay faithful to your wife, exploring her wild fantasies or... go wild and date other girls behind her back.

name: Cosmic Clash
description: Battle your friends for space superiority in this arcade style space shooter. Select your star fighter and jump into Cosmic Clash where you try and eliminate your friends while surviving the perils of space.

name: Version Three: Invisible Raid
description: Authentic Customizable Mech Action Game. Customize the combat mech "V3" and run through the battlefield!

name: Awakening Sarah
description: Awakening Sarah is an upcoming sequel to Dreaming Sarah, a 2D platformer with an emphasis on exploration. Unravel the dreams and realities of Sarah, a girl who's recovering from a coma, while helping her understand the world around her and herself.

name: Mark of the Deep
description: Mark of the Deep is an epic pirate-themed adventure with strong narrative and a thrilling mix of Metroidvania and Souls-Like elements. Embark on this journey as the fierce Marcus "Rookie" Ramsey and explore the mysteries of a cursed island to find your missing pirate crew.

name: The Quinfall
description: Embark on an adventurous journey to explore the Quinfall universe. Be a part of unique battles and an immersive story with dozens of different professions in the depths of medieval times in an all-new MMORPG experience.

name: Shadow Survival
description: Shadow Survival is a single-player / multiplayer cooperative wave based first person shooter with deep class and weapon customization, on procedurally generated landscapes, against armies of procedurally generated demonic forces.

name: Synduality: Echo of Ada
description:
You and an AI mech named Magus explore a dystopian landscape in the year 2222. A catastrophic poisonous rain event known as Tears of the New Moon nearly eradicated the human race — survivors fled to the underground city of Amasia. To survive, the player character known as a “Drifter” must sell AO Crystals, which can only be harvested from the polluted outside world. To travel, you’ll drive around in a vehicle called the Cradle Coffin, which you can customize.

The game will also have a unique PvP option, wherein playing online will support encounters with others plays on their own missions - you might collide head to head while trying to gather precious supplies

name: After He Was Gone
description: "After He Was Gone" is a Tactical RPG. NO level-up system. Character's skills and items will change the battle situation significantly. Collect the treasures and lead therianthropes from getting out from the world of board game. Don’t worry. If YOU don’t lose hope, we can rewind the time any time.

name: Night of Love
description: Some things may seem unforgivable at the first, but a long night spent together may change everything and bring back the forgotten feelings...

name: Cat Detective Albert Wilde
description: Cat Detective Albert Wilde is a comedy game, a genre-bending noirish sci-fi mystery set in a fictional version of New York in the 1930's featuring atmospheric black & white vintage visuals, and loveable anthropomorphic characters. Players must muddle their way through a murder mystery that's messier than a fresh hairball, with a captivating voice-over and at least one joke about cat nipples (they have six!).

name: Seifuku Kanojo 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Nefiriya x Super Astro Cat Bundle
description: Nefiriya and the Sands of Eternity + Super Astro Cat Bundle

name: Bundle: Monster Dynamite + Ultimate Runner
description: Sin descripción

name: Great Again: 3D Shooter
description: Fight the Zombies, Clear the Chaos, Become the Hero!

name: Tales Beyond The Tomb: The Last Vigil
description: Nick Harrison, a new security guard at the Guadalupe Cemetery, believes he is taking on a peaceful night shift. However, as night falls, he soon discovers he was very wrong. Nick realizes the cemetery holds more than just the dead.

name: Star Wars: Prequel Pack
description: The STAR WARS: Prequel Pack offers four action-packed STAR WARS games for one low price!

name: Losen Screws Puzzles
description: Solve over 100 tricky screw puzzles und unsrew them all!

name: Hentai Girls: Pissy Pirate
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: English Sensei: Teaching in Japan
description: Take control of a young teacher's destiny! Each decision will influence her relationships and lead her to discover unique endings. Which will you choose?

name: Arcade Archives: Final Star Force
description:
"FINAL STAR FORCE" is a shooter released by TECMO in 1992.
Two thousand years after the previous work, you will take on the final battle against the resurrected nemesis, GORDESS.
Your ship Final Star II will gradually power up over time. Strengthen it to the maximum to obtain unrivaled strength!

name: Mr. Sensei: Life as a Foreign Teacher in Japan
description: Decide the fate of a teacher! Every decision influences his relationships and leads to unique endings. Which will you choose?

name: Zombie Blitz
description: This ruined Earth sees movement once more?! In the midst of waves of robots waking once more, the zombies' solo struggle begins in this action roguelike!

name: The Auto Sort Is Broken
description: Set in a universe parodying poorly managed MMORPGs, even the inventory sort feature has stopped working. It's now up to you to organize the players' messy bags and handle their occasional complaints.

name: Room Washer
description: A thrilling game full of satisfaction as you become a sponge character and clean up rooms! Clear stages by scrubbing away dirt with a cute character while dodging enemies. Once you play, you’ll be hooked on the fun!

name: Bananitro
description: Bananitro is a 2D game where you control Monkey on his bicycle, using Bananitro to perform maneuvers and conquer obstacle-filled tracks, with creativity as the key to success.

name: Kanji de Go! Shueisha Manga-sai
description: The popular kanji quiz game "Kanji de GO!" teams up with Shueisha manga in a dream collaboration! Challenge yourself with furigana quizzes featuring tricky kanji from a wide range of Shueisha's classic and modern hit manga!

name: Mandragora Seeker in the Creep Zone
description: A timid gravedigger’s strange adventure to claim the Mandragora Gold Prize! Grow Mandragoras affected by weather, moon phases, and time, while fending off ghosts and fireballs to win the ultimate prize!

name: Red Solstice 2: Survivors - Ultimate Edition
description:
Plan your strategy and undertake real-time combat missions, in this sequel to the best-selling tactical game, Red Solstice!

The Red Solstice 2: Survivors Ultimate Edition contains the base game, as well as all previously released DLCs, including new story lines, classes, maps and much more!

name: Merge Numbers
description: Sin descripción

name: Equinox
description:
It's been over a year since that dreaded autumn.

Over spring break, April takes Scarlet out to the Spring Fling Dance at the botanical gardens by campus. What follows is a short story about how we take care of each other, shifting roles, and letting a relationship grow.

name: Payday: Don't Be a Hero
description: Don't Be a Hero puts you in the shoes of a civilian, in the middle of a Payday heist!

name: Ninja Gaiden II Black
description: Using Unreal Engine 5 to significantly enhance graphic expression, this is the definitive version of "NINJA GAIDEN 2," featuring additional playable characters and enhanced battle support functions.

name: Gorilla Attack
description: Sin descripción

name: Escape Game The Resort Facility
description:
The orthodox escape game for you, staged in a resort facility.
Can you solve all the riddles and get out?

name: Escape from Nightmare: Horror Tales
description: A dark and terrifying horror full of secrets and mysteries will make you feel the whole atmosphere of escaping from an abandoned labyrinth.

name: Eggconsole Zanac MSX
description: A representative shooting game for the MSX. Pilot the fighter ZANAC and use 8 types of special weapons to defeat the mechanized army!

name: Deadlo: Escape Room Adventure
description: Uncover the secrets of a frozen world. Explore ancient Arctic ruins, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover the power of a lost artifact.

name: Infinity Nikki: Firework Season
description:
As fireworks light up the night sky, a fantastical adventure unfolds on the new event Isles, and a mysterious ship from the Linlang Empire arrives... The grand celebration is about to begin, and Miraland welcomes all stylists!

Reflected in the eyes of The Wishing One, the all-caring Sprite...
A glimmer of sparkle, a touch of luck...
Should you find yourself lost in the depths or adrift in shadow...
He shall deliver the guidance of Whim.

name: Cats Visiting Lunar New Year
description: Celebrate Chinese New Year! Find 100 hidden cats in 5 festive drawings and collect all 12 zodiac animals.

name: Ocean Driving: Boat Parking Simulator
description: Realistic watercraft boat parking simulator - test your ship mooring skills in dangerous conditions!

name: Superstore
description: Build, manage, and thrive in the bustling world of retail.

name: Strania: The Stella Machina - EX
description: The excitement of a true "ARCADE GAME" can now be experienced once again!

name: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero DLC 1 - Hero of Justice
description:
Get ready to unleash your inner hero in DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO DLC1 – Hero of Justice Pack!

11 new characters, 1 exclusive costume, 3 custom battles… and that's not all!

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Bangkok
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Bangkok landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: 90s Extreme Skiing
description: That '90s extreme sports vibe is back … now in VR!

name: Street Food Restaurant Owner
description:
You don't need Mishelin Star to create the best restaurant in the world. Who says street food can't be delicious?

Start a real street food restaurant in your city and make it a legend. It's all for your beloved customers and let everyone visit you and find something tasty. Make this place trendy and watch your business grow!

Expand and upgrade your restaurant. Every guest will feel the fusion of the simple street food and amazing taste. Be a perfectionist and create something unique even in such a trivial place.

Manage the restaurant - add tables and new thematic spaces. Open new zones and add new dishes. Experiment with the menus and the ingredients. It's all up to you!

Let everyone taste and fall in love with your delicious street food!

name: Knight's Night!
description: Knight's Night! is a retro-style 1-bit platformer. Collect items, unlock new abilities, and make your way into the evil wizard's castle to save the kingdom!

name: TheLostWoods
description: You find yourself lost deep in a strange forest. Will you be able to find the right path and escape this mysterious forest safely?

name: Greed Stays Home
