description: A horror walking sim that emphasizes atmosphere, tension, fear, and immersive storytelling, all heightened by well-timed jump scares. The game takes place in a village frozen in time, stuck somewhere in the mid-20th century.

name: 1000 Princes
description: 1000 Princes is a female-oriented 3D visual novel romance game. A fracture in your timeline has caused all your prince husbands—spanning past, present and future from different settings—to time-travel to your current era. Now1,000 princes coexist on your shared timeline, protecting and adoring you.

name: Turbo Dismount 2
description: Turbo Dismount 2 is a comedy physics racing sandbox with Mr. Dismount and his friends. It is the officially ambitious sequel to the wildly popular, immensely successful, world-renowned entertainment juggernaut - Turbo Dismount.

name: Star Wars: Episode I - Jedi Power Battles
description: Take back the Theed Royal Palace in this fast and furious lightsaber action game. You will have the power of the Force and your trusty lightsaber to help you ward off legions of battle droids, destroyer droids, assassins, and other creatures from Star Wars: The Phantom Menace.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Nintendo Switch Edition
description: The critically acclaimed Guilty Gear Strive arrives on Nintendo Switch for the first time, complete with the first three season passes of DLC to make for a total of 28 playable characters!

name: Tokyo Xtreme Racer
description: "Tokyo Xtreme Racer" is a racing game set in a blocked-off future Tokyo, where players aim to be the fastest by driving their best cars on the highways that weave through the city. A new title, "Tokyo Xtreme Racer" now in development please look forward to the release of more information.

name: Horizons: The End Of Words
description: Humanity has written all there is to write about anything and everything. Words will soon lose all meaning. Find fragments of lost words drifting in space and explore the universe through your prose.

name: The Jiang Shi 2: Curse of Soul
description: This is an independent development game based on the Chinese folklore "JiangShi", with a 2.5D horizontal operation perspective as the main focus, and features exploration, decryption, fighting, capture and other game features and gameplay.

name: Hunter Moonstrike
description: Hunter Moonstrike is the first survival game integrated with artificial intelligence. In this game, all npc have their own unique story and you can see the story of the game from their point of view. Talk to any person, ask any question you like, they will answer and think they are alive

name: Chaos Express
description: Run, Deliver and do it with care. Become an owner of Delivery point in near-future city and make all the parcels reach their destination. Do it yourself or with friends.

name: Kick the Boss's Ass
description: Collect items and defeat the annoying boss!

name: Airships: Lost Flotilla
description: Airships: Lost Flotilla is a steampunk autoshooter where you fight your way through waves of enemies on your way to a safe harbour. Destroy your foes, harvest wreckage, and upgrade your ship.

name: Casino Simulator 2024
description: Casino Simulator: Build, manage, and expand your own casino from scratch. Hire staff, design your casino, and delight customers by offering the most popular games. Enjoy the thrill of the casino experience!

name: AI2U: With You ‘Till The End
description: A first-person escape room game with AI-powered NPCS who are desperate to keep you by their side... so much so that they will resort to drastic measures to keep you from leaving! Explore the environment, solve puzzles, and uncover mysteries in different levels with various themes.

name: Mysterious Mystery, EP 1: The Duo Dilemma
description: Mysterious Mystery is a fully voiced mystery visual novel centered around the detective duo, Justin and Dakota. Solve multiple cases using Dakota's evidence gathering abilities and Justin's expert interrogation. Discover outlandish cases, meet unique characters, and become world class detectives.

name: Streamer Life Simulator 2
description: In the second game of the series, competition has increased and now everyone wants to be a streamer. Are you ready to stream until your cpu burns out?

name: Sword of the Necromancer: Resurrection
description: Help Tama to save Koko using the powers of the forbidden Sword of the Necromancer. Turn your foes into allies and reach the depths of the Necromancer's dungeon. Gain enough power to bring Koko back from the dead, no matter the cost. Now in 3D and with a renewed battle system!

name: Wren's Resurgence
description: Wren’s Resurgence is a 2D action platformer where Wren must fight her way through the Yokai-infested lands in order to rescue her sister Swan. With the evil force’s tyrannical grasp on the island, it’s up to Wren to brandish her katana and bring peace back to the land.

name: Virtual Love Secrets
description: A visual novel a little unusual, which not only the decisions you make change the course, but each game will be personal.

name: Legends of Savvarah: Children of the Sun
description: A fantasy interactive story (visual novel) where the mysteries of ancient gods, enigmas of bygone eras, magic, and the complex relationships between various beings are intricately woven together.

name: Butcher's Creek
description: Use rusty tools to brutalize a perverted gang of serial torturers in the remote Appalachian Forest.

name: Exterminators of Saturn
description: A top down, twin stick shooter inspired by classic retro arcade games with loads of enemies, fast paced bullet hell combat, big boss battles and tons of weapon customizations.

name: Dreamcore
description: Step into the surreal with Dreamcore, a body-cam styled psychological horror game that plunges you into the eerie beauty of "liminal spaces." Unravel the mysteries of Dreamcore’s non-linear worlds and uncover its hidden secrets. Can you discover what lies beyond the edge of reality?

name: Realm of Simplicity
description: Realm of Simplicity is a indie-developed MMORPG that will have you embark on your own adventure. Complete quests, master your skills, party-up and conquer dungeons all at your own pace!

name: Infest
description: Infest is a roguelike deckbuilder where you manipulate the battleground Pixel-by-Pixel. Every pixel is physically simulated to burn, freeze, corrode, shock, and melt. Deploy a carefully-crafted deck to unleash impressive chain reactions on the alien infestation!

name: Dead of Darkness
description: Dead of Darkness is a 2D survival-horror action-adventure. Investigate a missing persons case on Velvet Island and unravel its disturbing secret. You’ll have to face grotesque creatures, hurdle deadly traps, solve puzzles, and most importantly, survive.

name: Venus in Furs: Sensual Pleasure
description: Hardpunch's Venus is alone in her temple of love, pleasure, and sex. She knows that the world we know no longer exists. Now, she remains a recluse in her palace and anyone who dares to steal her precious gifts will be punished with explicit and savage sex. This invader will become her sex slave...

name: Prison Life Simulator: The Legend of Navalny
description: Immerse yourself in the prison life of the most dangerous criminal in modern Russia.Go through the prison path from the beginning and determine the fate of the famous defendant. What will you become? Offended, authority or maybe the president of the Russian Federation? Everything depends on you!

name: Osman Gazi
description: Osman Gazi 3D RPG Game

name: Divine Legacy
description: Divine Legacy is a dark story/character-driven action RPG with hints of humor, friendship, and bonds. Fight your way through hordes of demons, and move one step closer towards the truth!

name: Creo God Simulator
description: Creo God Simulator is a game of building, decision-making, survival, and a ton of peasant smiting. As a newly-assigned lesser god, it's your job to build a society bit by bit, while convincing your new population to believe in you as their one true god.

name: Rocket Boots Mania
description: Rocket Boots Mania is a fully-loaded 3D platformer set in a thrilling open world filled with interactions, puzzles, secrets, and collectibles. The game features singleplayer campaign as well as asynchronous multiplayer through online leaderboards.

name: Doom Anthology
description: The Doom Anthology takes players through more than three decades of demon slaying - from the classic games that popularized the first-person shooter genre to the fan favorite franchise reboot and its sequel.

name: Kabziman
description: Sin descripción

name: Paintings Restoration
description: Sin descripción

name: Stellar Strider
description: Sin descripción

name: StompyBoy
description: Pilot a big stompy mech, and shoot other big stompy mechs with your various lasers. That's about it.

name: Goddess Of Swing
description: A Highscore Chaser game, made from german group of students.

name: The Reward of Cherishment and Eternity.
description:
Death, nature's remedy for all things, offers you a deal: Help him, and he shall grant peace for a lost loved one.

-Explore a visually stunning world filled with hidden secrets and unravel its mysteries at your own pace.
-Chart your own path by playing the levels in any order, enhancing replayability.
-Master a deep and complex combat system, with fully integrated DualSense wireless controller features, including haptic feedback and adaptive triggers for unparalleled tactile engagement.

The Reward of Cherishment and Eternity is a third-person, action-adventure shooter that combines exploration, emotionally charged storytelling, and intense, rewarding combat.

name: Bottop
description: Sin descripción

name: Jumpng Disable
description:
"Casual 3D JUMPNG game"

A game that feels familiar yet refreshingly new—and occasionally downright crazy. No further explanation needed.
Let's JUMPNG!

name: Varyznex
description: A horizontal scrolling 2D shmup

name: The Short Trip
description: The Short Trip is a game about driving and surviving in an endless desert along a somewhat-long almost-short road.

name: RedShift
description:
In a city on the edge of nothing, the race is on.
Everything unnessessary to compete must go. No safety gear, no doors. Just you, an engine, and a bucket we've welded you inside of.

name: GuGu Pizza: Delivering Pizza to the Space Station? Boss, This is Just Not Right!
description: GuGu Pizza’s motto is to deliver anywhere! So couldn't refuse the pineapple pizza order that came from the space station. Eventually, the pigeon deliveryman begins a high-altitude jump to deliver pizza to space, passing through the city, forest, and sky...

name: Scary World
description:
You are about to see a scary world.

Your goal is to survive just ten minutes in this bouncy, bumpy, dynamic and surprising bullet heaven. Inspired by Vampire Survivors.

name: Triptych Book I: Blockhead
description: Triptych Book I: Blockhead is a graphical adventure set in an alternate version of World War One with simple point and click interface, easy to use controls & rip-roaring adventure in the skies!

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 1.5 - Astra-nomical Moment
description:
Version 1.5 of Zenless Zone Zero, which includes:

• New Characters: Astra and Evelyn
• New Outfits for Ellen, Nicole and Astra
• New Events
• ...and more!

name: Pio
description: Prove your strength in the world of stars and become the brightest one of all! PIO faces trials to show his light and challenges himself to become the most radiant star.

name: Aquarun
description: Dive into the vibrant world of AquaRun, a fast-paced 2D pixel art platformer that tests your reflexes, precision, and determination! Inspired by the best of hardcore platforming games, AquaRun challenges you to guide a fragile yet determined character through 40 meticulously designed levels filled with relentless obstacles, devious traps, and tricky platforms.

name: Waifu Simulator: Latex Edition
description: Waifu Simulator is a simulation game whose ultimate goal is to bring you pleasure and relaxation!

name: Popotinho's Adventures
description: Guide a mischievous kid back to his parents in a vibrant side-scrolling adventure!

name: The Shell Part III: Paradiso
description:
The coiling chains of obsession that began with The Shell now threaten to strangle Detective Reiji Tokisaka in the third and final entry in the trilogy. As old friends and foes rise up for one last confrontation, can anyone break the cycle—and can Reiji's heart ever be set free?

(This version is the censored Steam release of The Shell Part III: Paradiso)

name: Dark Trip
description:
Dark Trip is a psychedelic VR escape room where the hero is forced to use drugs investigating a sadomasochistic lab.

The game of Escape Room genre features Lavcraftian setting, Psychedelic Trips gameplay mechanics and the goals to collect and investigate evidences. Some event in the game are inspired by David Lynch's and Terry Gilliam's movies.

- Experiences Psychedelic Trips. Use VR to immerse yourself into psychedelic experiences not possible on any other gaming platform.

- Investigate the Sadomasochistic Laboratory. Solve twisted riddles in surrealistic setting of physical and mental torture.

- Collect the Pieces of Horrible Truth. Search for clues, artifacts and diary pieces in each location to discover the dark story behind the events.

name: Rusty Dudes
description: Assemble a team to complete various missions, while fighting off hordes of freaks. In your will be available two dozen unique mercenaries with different skills. Combine them at your discretion.

name: Dog Walking Adventures
description: Dog Walking Adventures invites players into a cozy casual experience where the simple joys of walking with a canine companion become an adventure in itself. Walk around and explore immersive environments, all while playing with your dog, completing quests and collecting items.

name: Shalnor: Silverwind Saga
description: Rynna has arrived on one of Shalnor's most dangerous Islands. Prepare yourself for an epic RPG/Action Adventure game. With focus on gauntlet-style combat, traps, boss fights and beautiful pixel-art scenery.

name: Noroi Kago: The Grudged Domain
description: Noroi Kago: The Grudged Domain is a four-player co-op survival horror game centered on the supernatural "Yokai" from Japanese folklore. Trapped in a cursed domain, you and your companions must work together to endure the curse, hide from the terrifying Yokai, and find a way to escape.

name: Gravelord
description: Gravelord is a fast-paced boomer shooter voiced by a badass protagonist featuring hand-crafted levels filled with secrets and hordes of enemies to kill. Dish out some brutal carnage with powerful guns and collect Tarot Cards to gain even more killing power. Let's put the fun back in funeral!

name: Dog Walking Sim
description: Dog Walking Sim is a first-person experience, that invites players into a virtual world where the simple joys of walking with a canine companion become an adventure in itself. Players can immerse themselves in a relaxing environment and play with their dog or go on quests and collect other dogs.

name: Disorder
description: Escape the department store and uncover the hidden truth in this full 3D roguelike dungeon crawler

name: Farmer's Shop Simulator
description: Create your own farm. Harvest crops, take care of animals, sell goods, set prices at your discretion, hire staff, expand, design, and build your dream farm.

name: Silverwind
description: An RPG/Action Adventure game. With focus on gauntlet-style combat, traps, boss fights and beautiful pixel-art scenery.

name: Supermarket Bash
description: This is a happy and tense weekend. The rush to buy in the supermarket has quietly begun. As a member of this family, are you ready to contribute to this carnival?

name: Ender Magnolia: Bloom in the Mist
description:
Decades after the Rain of Death, a new journey begins in the Land of Fumes, where mystical powers lie beneath the earth. The kingdom’s desire for conquest led to the creation of the Homunculi, machine-like artificial life forms prepared to execute the king’s will. A recent resource-harvesting mission gone awry caused toxic vapors to emerge from underground, driving both man and machine to feral madness.

As the Homonculi devolve into dangerous creatures, guide Lilac –- an “Attuner” with the power to purify those infected by the fumes — on a quest to save the kingdom. With the help of friendly machines and spirits who fight in Lilac’s stead, fend off mechanized legions of lunging carcasses, cannonball-firing corpses and chainsaw-wielding goblins terrorizing the land.

Turn foes into friends by exorcizing corruption from enemy bosses. Wield their powers to add 30 different abilities to Lilac’s combat repertoire in an enhanced battle system where she can equip up to four special abilities at once. Improve Lilac’s odds of surviving this hunt for lost memories by leveling up attack strength, HP, and armor.

Explore the depths, heights and far corners of the kingdom for lore-filled relics. Collect and trade gold for upgraded items at the Blacksmith’s storefront. Combine story fragments from the kingdom’s fleeing inhabitants with Lilac’s forgotten memories. Seek the truth in an atmospheric hand-drawn setting set to the soothing serenades of returning musical group Mili (Ghost in the Shell, Goblin Slayer) with a brand new original soundtrack available for purchase at launch.

name: Dawn of Anarchy
description: In Dawn of Anarchy, your skills, determination, and combat prowess will be put to the ultimate test. Will you be the hero the world needs to quell the uprising and bring an end to mechanical tyranny? Prepare for the battle of a lifetime amidst the dawn of anarchy.

name: Ekorella Vol 1
description: A turn-based RPG set in a fantastic society of plants and animals. Fight against monsters and visit exotic places that have their unique culture and history. Beware of what lurks in the darkness...

name: Border Town
description: 2D top down view open world sandbox survival farming game. Survive, adventure, hunt, gather resources, craft, build, farm, fish, trade, become an adventurer, complete various tasks and explore this fantasy world.

name: Mika and the Witch's Mountain
description: Soar with the wind on your broomstick, deliver packages to your friends, and explore a vibrant sandbox world in a coming of age adventure about an aspiring witch!

name: Rally Mechanic Simulator
description: Take your opportunity as a real Rally Mechanic. Overcome all the obstacles that the reckless racers throw at you - including unrepairable parts, time limitations and more. Take good care of your rally cars so that on the next special they will perform as good as if they came out of the factory.

name: Few Nights More
description: Few Nights More is a roguelike turn-based RPG based in a world where Vampire Lords seek to conquer lost territories and their place in the world. Design and defend your stronghold, slay your enemies with traps, fulfill your Lord’s true potential, slowly conquering what is rightfully yours.

name: Way of the Hunter: Ultimate Edition
description: Way of the Hunter - Ultimate Edition is the collection of hunting grounds all over the world and all existing equipment packs. In this authentic hunting simulation, you can explore the vast the in-game wilderness and fulfill all your hunting fantasies.

name: 4-in-1 Award Winning Bundle
description: Get 4 award-winning games and enjoy capturing stories of joy and heartbreak.

name: Landing
description: Our ship has suffered an unknown disaster and has been forced to dock on the side of this planet, and all you have to do is lead us to repair the ship and continue its voyage, however, the danger is getting closer and closer without our knowledge......

name: A Simple Garbage Sorting Game
description: We are recruiting a large number of testers from around the world to participate in an unprecedented secret experiment.. Join us and embark on this journey of exploration that is crucial to survival. In this unknown experiment, your choices will determine the fate of the Earth

name: Mini Market Design
description: Build your dream market and welcome your customers!

name: Minecraft: Hello Kitty and Friends
description: Step into Hello Kitty's World in this sweet DLC! Build a cozy farm, grow crops, and raise Animals with Hello Kitty and Friends. Upgrade your House with Cute new Furniture and enjoy Fun Seasonal events like egg hunts and pumpkin carving!

name: Virtual Happy Land
description: Sin descripción

name: MediEvil II
description:
A port of MediEvil 2, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

MediEvil 2, or MediEvil II in its NA release, is an action-adventure game originally developed by SCE Cambridge Studio and published by Sony Computer Entertainment. Released in 2000 for the PlayStation, it is a sequel to the original MediEvil and continues the story of Sir Daniel Fortesque.

Set in Victorian-era London, the game follows Sir Dan as he is resurrected once again to stop a sorcerer named Lord Palethorn, who has unleashed chaos by reanimating the dead using pages from Zarok's spellbook. The gameplay combines hack-and-slash combat, exploration, and puzzle-solving, with new weapons, levels, and enemies. The game introduces unique features such as a ghostly ally, Kiya, and new mechanics like controlling Dan’s detached head for specific puzzles.

name: Indiana Jones and the Staff of Kings
description: The plot centers around Indy's search for the Staff of Moses. The game is mostly about a quest which takes you around the world on various quests, fighting Nazis, Panamanian hunters, and Tong thugs, and trying to find artifacts which will unlock other possible things for you to get and do.

name: Fideos
description: Just shoot another eel's brain.

name: Psychobouldering
description: Sin descripción

name: Diablo IV: Season of Witchcraft
description:
The Witches Need Your Help

You’ve been called upon, Wanderer. Harness wondrous and uncanny Witchcraft Powers as you unravel the mystery of who stole the Heads from the Tree of Whispers, earning Favor with the Witches of Hawezar to learn the secrets of their power. Hunt the Tree’s rogue Heads before they further spread madness to the creatures of Sanctuary resulting in new grotesque abominations - the Headrotten. Make use of the new Armory feature to quickly save and swap your builds. Earn Dorian, the new Raven Pet, by completing the Season Journey, discover new Uniques and Legendary Aspects, equip new Runes in Vessel of Hatred, and more.

name: Rust of Steel
description: "Rust of Steel" is a post-apocalyptic ruins exploration RPG with a high degree of freedom. Take on the world in your own style with multiple scenarios, free stat distribution, and the option to play as the good guy or the bad guy!

name: Matchmaking Inc.
description: A young single man returns to his hometown and takes over the family's matchmaking business. Matchmaking Inc. is a modern-themed RPG designed for men that combines gameplay elements of simulation management and text adventure.

name: Dokapon! Sword of Fury
description: Whosoever winds up wealthiest in the end (meaning, the bearer of the most assets) shall be deemed the winner! How do you achieve that? Well, by fighting monsters, plundering, pillaging, and betraying your best buds; that's how! All the rules are made to be broken in this board game!

name: Transcontinental
description: Play as a survivor of the aftermath of a train wreck during the Western Expansion era. Traverse the haunting railway tracks of a rural settlement cursed by supernatural forces unleashed after displacing Native inhabitants.

name: 1000 Missiles: Defense of Tornwa
description: Missile Defense Game: Protect Your Country The enemy will employ various strategies to breach your defenses. Stay adaptable to survive. Defend Your Nation: Use strategic placement and upgrades of your AA systems to fend off relentless missile attacks and protect your country.

name: Legion Defense
description: Legion Defense is a TD game made with the Y3 Editor that swaps boring mercenaries for epic hero showdowns! In special rounds, you’ll face enemy heroes and feel the thrill of battle. The KOF mode allows for 3v3 matches to compete for the top spot. join the ultimate battle now!

name: Drug Trader Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: The Accuser and the Abyss
description: You are a detective. You have been assigned a partner to investigate a horrid case. But things are not what it seems. Navigate the paths as you attempt to unravel the truth behind your lost memories and your new disturbing detective partner.

name: Moldbreaker: Rise of the Loaf
description: 'Moldbreaker: Rise of the Loaf' is a quirky 3D roguelite-action game where you play as Bradley the Breadapus, a waffle-tailed bread platypus, battling moldy monstrosities to save the Bread Kingdom! Dodge, slap, and upgrade yourself to restore freshness and fight the rise of the mold!

name: Needy Streamer Overload: Typing of The Net
description: "Needy Streamer Overload: Typing of The Net" is a typing game in which you enter internet lingo in a call-and-response format with a girl (OMGkawaiiAngel) who has a strong need for approval.

name: Inspector Douglas's Diary
description: This is a detective game where you play as a middle-aged inspector searching for a terrifying serial killer in an isolated village. However, as a player, if you uncover the killer’s motives, you might consider whether to cooperate with them to achieve their goal of "killing THE time."

name: Sacrifice Villains
description: Ever since the day the powers appeared, crime has ruled the streets of Scum City. As the conniving villains grow stronger and stronger, and the heroes find themselves walloped rather than walloping... it falls to you to rehabilitate S-rank villains in this short visual novel!

name: Escape from the Cursed Convent
description: Escape from the Cursed Convent is a narrative-driven adventure game set in a medieval girls' convent, offering a rich storytelling experience, and several gameplay styles including QTE, hunting, cooking, and puzzle-solving.

name: Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders
description: Test your skiing skills in serene mountain scenery. Perform tricks, discover shortcuts and try to best your time in the snowy followup to Lonely Mountains: Downhill. Enjoy the slopes alone, participate in thrilling online multiplayer races or gather your friends and conquer the mountains together.

name: Oracle of Meles
description: An ancient prophecy, a chosen one? Hack and slash your way through an evil castle, collect powerful artifacts, and uncover its dark secrets. Explore this 2D hand-drawn world full of magic and monsters where nothing is as it seems.

name: Demon's Regalia: Colosseum
description: A Turn-based Combat Fighting game featuring monster girls, monsters, and human warriors alike; to earn wealth and glory in the colosseum!

name: Jötunnslayer: Hordes of Hel
description: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel is a gripping roguelike horde-survivor game set in the dark realms of Norse Mythology. Fight waves of enemies to earn divine blessings of ancient Norse Gods, explore hostile worlds and face powerful bosses. Become a god-like warrior in this ultimate showdown.

name: Vambrace: Dungeon Monarch
description: Vambrace: Dungeon Monarch is a unique combination of Deck-Building and Dungeon Defense, with a wide variety of military units and combinations, strategies and magic manifested in cards. Make your dungeon more dangerous by defending it against increasingly powerful enemies.

name: Blazing Trail
description: Escape failed! All we have left is our will to survive, the endless hordes of enemies, and enough bullets to rip them all to shreds. Blazing trail. Vertical co-op shooter, offering accessible, action-packed gameplay.

name: Somber Echoes
description: Take the role of the resurrected Adrestia and embark on an epic journey to prevent your twin sister from unraveling the universe. Master acrobatic combat, explore the Greco-Roman space vessel Atromitos, and shape your destiny in Somber Echoes.

name: Super Arter
description:
Super Arter is a puzzle/platform game inspired by the Mario vs Donkey Kong, with an emphasis on pick up the key to take to the door solving puzzles. Featuring pixel art inspired by 16bits games.

Jump, throw objects, use switches, dodge traps, defeat enemies and much more to overcome the obstacles in your path, while looking for the key to open the door to the next level, and free your way until you face the boss of each world to collect all Domino Relics.

-Solve various puzzles in up to 5 different worlds with many stages.

-Face a powerful boss at the end of each world

Recover the Domino Relics stolen by the Dark Wizard, solving the most challenging puzzles, facing enemies, collecting gifts, and discovering the best way for Arter to take the key to the door, in this Puzzle/Platform game.

name: The Last day of Han Dynasty
description: “The last day of Han dynasty”It is a survival simulation business game based on the background of the end of the Han Dynasty in China. From the perspective of ordinary people, you can spend a difficult but warm time, and keep warm together with the characters you know in the troubled times.

name: Space Accident VR
description: Step into the future with our groundbreaking VR game set in the year 2119, where humanity embarks on a historic journey into space. Join the "CCM-1" (Callisto Colonization Mission) expedition, aimed at the enigmatic moon of Jupiter - Callisto.

name: Dad's Coming
description: Meet Dad's Coming, a fast paced co-op game about cleaning up your mess before your parents come back home! Help Kate and Bob cooperate to get items across rooms and hazards to get rid of the mess in time! Careful not to break anything and be aware of Jack, a kitty that loves knocking things over!

name: Code Alkonost: Awakening of Evil
description: Code Alkonost is a first-person story-rich, atmospheric survival horror adventure game inspired by Slavic mythology. Travel through a dark fantasy world and encounter the possessive spirits and illusions of the underworld. Experience authentic art style and stories never before seen in horror games.

name: Blacksmith Simulator
description: Become a Medieval blacksmith in this interactive blacksmithing simulator. Upgrade your forging equipment, unlock new exotic crafting materials, grow your business, and manage your customers - in addition to engaging forging mechanics. Strike while the iron is hot and hop in front of the forge now!

name: Brutes.io
description:
Frantic Online Multiplayer Evolution Brawler

Original developed by BulletProof, now rereleased in January 2025 by the original developer, under Funk Games on itch.io: https://funkgames.itch.io/brutes

name: Smiling Misery
description: Smiling Misery is an interactive tale that introduces us to the story of Margo, a jester who, weary of a comfortable life, embarks on a journey to seek misery. Join Margo on a brief adventure through a Mediterranean medieval kingdom and bring the story to its conclusion.

name: Elect
description: Elect is a multiplayer political simulation game. Run in elections, join or lead a political party, and vote on laws in the U.S. and 15+ other countries. Become your country's leader and declare wars, send foreign aid, appoint a cabinet, fight pandemics, vote in the United Nations, and more.

name: Family Vacation Bundle: 20 Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Arab Drift Cars 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Queen of Treasure Isle
description:
Queen of treasure isle is a simple, small-scale metroidvania that mainly consists of bomb throwing and jumping.

You can retrieve the treasure hidden in various places and return home in a balloon when you are done.

name: Idun: Frontline Survival
description: A defense RTS where you can move turrets at will. Extract resources, upgrade technology, and defend against enemy swarms in a gripping space campaign. Hold the line, set up your turrets, and brace for screen-filling hordes!

name: Little Bartmares
description: On a dark night in Springfield, Bart Simpson sleeps quietly in his bedroom. However inside his mind, he's experiencing a little nightmare...

name: Call of Clans
description: Call of Clans is an online turn-based strategy card game set in a magical world. Build a versatile deck with minion and skill cards to challenge equally matched opponents in a world of swords and magic. Team up with others to conquer challenging co-op dungeons

name: Skibidi Gyatrooms
description: Skibidi Gyatrooms is a 1-5 player co-op horror game. You and the homies just fell into the Backrooms, you must out-GYAT the Skibidi Toilet with max rizz or get flushed. Expect cursed levels, and brainrot that’ll keep you on edge.

name: TimeTrain
description: TimeTrain is a time manipulation puzzle game where the player builds railways for a time travelling train.

name: The Curse of Mount Madre
description: The Curse of Mount Madre is a traditional turn-based JRPG with a wild west twist.

name: Marerium
description: Sin descripción

name: Government Contractors: Arms of Influence
description: Historically accurate strategy game where you act as a government contractor researching, developing, and manufacturing weapons and technology for your clients. You choose the parts for each product, but be aware that cheap or wrong political choices may affect your success rate!

name: Super Sorry
description: You play as a salaryman who gets caught in various everyday troubles and overcomes them with acrobatic bows. From boss reprimands to client complaints and family issues, showcase your elegant apology skills across different scenarios. What shocking ending awaits?

name: Amatsuki Mahjong
description: Amatsuki Mahjong is a ACG style mahjong game that offers real-time multiplayer online matches. It features four styles of mahjong: Japanese, Sichuan, Taiwanese, and Hong Kong Mahjong. Enjoy a variety of play styles tailored to your preferences.

name: Too Tired To Die
description: Too Tired To Die is a fast-paced survivorlike multiplayer online PVP game. Seeking help from others is better than seeking help from yourself, the amnesiac ones must face all kinds of demons and monsters, and dive into the pile of couriers to retrieve his own share of soul.

name: Pairs & Perils
description: Pairs & Perils is a memory-game roguelike and dungeon crawler. Match cards to attack enemies, avoid traps, shop for relics and consumables. Sharpen your mind as you journey through the depths of the dungeon in search of The Dealer.

name: Rival Stars Horse Racing: VR Edition
description:
Immerse yourself in a scenic horse ranch to experience the joy and pride of caring for a world-class stable of horses in Rival Stars Horse Racing: VR Edition.
With the help of a friendly mentor, you’ll raise charming foals, care for and train a stable of unique horses, and compete to become a champion racer and rider.

name: WonderLang
description: Embark on an RPG adventure in WonderLang, where mastering a new language is part of the journey. Learn through quests, dialogues, and puzzles. Available in multiple languages with immersive gameplay. Begin your quest for language mastery today!

name: None Shall Intrude
description: Venture into None Shall Intrude, a roguelite deck-builder with tile-based combat where you become a powerful Raid Boss. Epic battles, intricate strategies, and the ever-present threat of heroic challengers seeking to vanquish your reign. Will you conquer all or fall to valiant heroes?

name: Runet Legend
description: To move further along the plot, you need to complete quests, look for various items that will help you get closer to the finale. Exciting adventures, secrets of the past and difficult decisions are waiting for you. Control the fate of Ozon671Games and help him figure out this difficult situation.

name: Yield! Fall of Rome
description: Forge your Kingdom amidst the Ruins of Rome! As the world crumbles, rebuild civilization and shape your destiny with every decision. Unleash your strategic prowess, conquer provinces, and explore dynamically generated campaigns that promise endless challenges!

name: Mekkablood: Quarry Assault
description: The Year is 2082. You play the role of Bill, a grizzled, and extremely hairy robojockey. It's up to you to take the reigns of Bill's Mekk, with your friend Rusty, to get your revenge against TorxCorp, who's trying to steal your mining claim.

name: Into the Emberlands
description: Venture out into the Emberlands and uncover an ever-changing world filled with surprising encounters and mystical creatures! Save villagers who got lost in the Miasma, collect resources and rebuild your village to create a safe haven for your people.

name: The Dark Side of Ceclon
description: Jensen, the sole survivor of the Nexentia shuttle crash on the planet CECLON. Alone, light years away from all human life! You will have to face the Nocturnes, primitive creatures in order to bring back the Veka energy, humanity's only hope.

name: City of Graves
description: As a soldier in a lifeless city after a disease outbreak, fight creatures and hunt for what will save the city.

name: Scarecropia
description: Here is Scarecropia! Lead at most 400 people to build a settlement. Arm your village to fight against the Goblin army, or invest limited resources in yourself to become unparalleled! Take every cost to survive!

name: Godly Survivors
description: Face thousands of lost souls in the arena of the gods! Godly Survivors invites you to embark on an epic journey through an action rogue-lite game where you will hunt down the mobs' souls to improve your skills and survive the trial of the gods.

name: Hexarium
description: A minimalistic traffic management game where you build and maintain a bustling road network to keep markets and homes connected and traffic flowing smoothly.

name: Mistery
description:
Mistery is a multiplayer game of survival and social deduction. You work with others to collect materials, survive the dangers, and complete tasks. Beware of monsters, but more of the Alternates disguising as your teammates. They can change into supernatural monsters and attack you at any time.

The game seamlessly blends survival, top-down combat, social deduction, and new weird stories into a unique and visually striking experience, strengthed by a proximity chat system. Join forces with friends to destroy some friendships in Mistery!

name: Escape from the Nursing Home
description: Dry mouth, arthritis and poor eyesight? That is not surprising, because you're an old man! It doesn't matter how you ended up in the nursing home, it matters how you get out of it!

name: Faunamorph
description: Mutant foes await: Transform into different animals and recombine your own DNA to unlock new abilities in Faunamorph. Uncover the mysteries of your origin in this action-packed 2D metroidvania about genetics and mutations.

name: Helskate
description: Helskate is a skateboarding action roguelite. Grind, perform tricks, and chain combos to power up your attacks to slay the monsters of Vertheim. Combine unique weapons and gear to suit your playstyle as you fight, die, and upgrade your abilities to come back to this labyrinth over and over again!

name: Settlements Rising
description: Settlements Rising is a resource management-focused survival and city-building simulation game set in medieval. While meeting the growing basic and luxury needs of the village through hunting, gathering, farming, and trading, you must also fend off raids on the village using military tactics.

name: Idun
description: Explosive singleplayer action RTS with a story campaign. Hold the line against massive swarms on a fully simulated battlefield.
